lines.i: Characteristics of a patient's cardiac arrest

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.27"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11130)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:10141)
Populate as true if NEMSIS EArrest.01 = "No"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" ASSERTION (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:10138)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10139)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.14

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD"/@code="410429000" cardiac arrest (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:10140)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.01

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10142)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10154)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10155)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Cardiac Arrest Cause (CONF:10941)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] informant (CONF:10144)
Such informants SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="INF" (CONF:10158)
Such informants SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] relatedEntity (CONF:11071)
This relatedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="AGNT" (CONF:10159)
This relatedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacArrestWitnessRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.11 DYNAMIC (CONF:10160)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.04

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10145)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10161)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10162)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Prior CPR (CONF:10942)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10146)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10168)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10169)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Prior AED Use (CONF:10170)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship (CONF:10147)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10181)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10182)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Return Of Spontaneous Circulation (CONF:10183)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship (CONF:10148)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10186)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10187)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Destination Rhythm (CONF:10188)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:11072)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10176)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10177)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Arrest Rhythm (CONF:10178)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:11377)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10149)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10151)
This entryRelationship contains zero or more [0..*] observation, where its type is Cardiac Arrest Timing

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:11332)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:11333)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Cardiac Arrest Outcome (CONF:11334)
contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode with @xsi:type="ActClassObservation"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11130)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:10141)
Populate as true if NEMSIS EArrest.01 = "No"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" ASSERTION (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:10138)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10139)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.14

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD"/@code="410429000" cardiac arrest (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:10140)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.01

Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Return Of Spontaneous Circulation (CONF:10183)

This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10151)
This entryRelationship contains zero or more [0..*] observation, where its type is Cardiac Arrest Timing

This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Cardiac Arrest Outcome (CONF:11334)
